data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the county of South Goa, Goa, India.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of South Goa, Goa, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of South Goa, Goa, India.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the county of South Goa.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in South Goa, Goa, India.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Curchorem
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Curchorem, Goa, India.
Please, teach the 7,046 believers in South Goa, Goa, India how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 640,500 citizens of South Goa, Goa, India, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in South Goa, Goa, India so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

location.name: South Goa
location.cities_list: Mormugao, Vasco da Gama, Madgaon, Curchorem, Sancoale
location.cities_list_w_pop: Mormugao (102,345), Vasco da Gama (100,485), Madgaon (86,818), Curchorem (22,510), Sancoale (16,311)
